alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:31AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and east central Limestone Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 630 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harvest, or 8 miles north of Madison, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Madison, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Harvest, Toney and Capshaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
